Module: transform

Object transformations API. With some exceptions specified below, make sure that the objects are not batched.
Source:
  • ext/transform.js, line 3

Methods

(static) empty_reset_transform(obj)

Reset EMPTY's transform to allow child objects behave in the absolute (world) space. Works only for EMPTYes with "relative group coords" option enabled.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object Object ID
Source:
  • ext/transform.js, line 211

(static) get_object_center(obj, calc_bs_center, destopt) → {Float32Array}

Get the object center in the world space. Works for dynamic and static objects.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
obj Object Object ID
calc_bs_center Boolean Use the object's bounding sphere to calculate center, otherwise the use bounding box.
dest Float32Array <optional>
 Destination vector
Source:

    (static) set_rotation_euler(obj, x, y, z)

    Set euler rotation in the YZX intrinsic system. Using euler angles is discouraged, use quaternion instead.
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    obj Object Object ID
    x Number Angle X
    y Number Angle Y
    z Number Angle Z
    Source:
    • ext/transform.js, line 160

    (static) set_rotation_euler_v(obj, euler)

    Set euler rotation in vector form. Using euler angles is discouraged, use quaternion instead.
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    obj Object Object ID
    euler Float32Array Vector with euler angles
